title: Burnout Paradise
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Race, jump and smash through the streets of Paradise City in muscle cars, exotics, hot rods and even supercharged SUVs designed from the ground up to look beautiful whether they’re brand new or torn to pieces!  Earn your Burnout Driver’s license by competing in over 100+ events including Races, Stunt Run, Road Rages and Marked Man.  Compete against your friends for Time Road Rules and tear up the streets in Showtime, the all new destructive open world crashing experience.  Looking for an online challenge, seamlessly connect with up to 7 buddies instantly, drive together cooperatively in over 300 Freeburn challenges or go head to head in custom created race routes across town. Take down your friends and grab their mugshots for your trophy room using the Xbox Live Vision Camera! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

contentRating.label: E10 (Everyone 10+)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Accolades Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Winner of 10 Editor’s Choice Awards and 3 Game of the Month honors, Burnout Paradise is a must own title that the media just can’t get enough of!  Check out some new gameplay footage and see what the critics have to say about Burnout Paradise.

childDownloads.title: Aggression Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Smash your opponents, tear through shortcuts, and demolish all vehicles with the aggression car class. These cars earn you a quick boost advantage, so slam and takedown any racers that get in your way. Take aggressive driving to the next level and rock Burnout Paradise your way.

childDownloads.title: Burnout Bikes Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: The next FREE installment of DLC pulls a wheelie right onto your Xbox 360 with Burnout Bikes!  Explore Paradise City like never before with 70 new freeburn challenges designed specifically for bikes, a new single player progression with 38 events, and four bikes to further enhance the online experience Burnout Paradise has become known for.  Welcome to Burnout Paradise: always changing!

childDownloads.title: Burnout Paradise
childDownloads.description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Race, jump and smash through the streets of Paradise City in muscle cars, exotics, hot rods and even supercharged SUVs designed from the ground up to look beautiful whether they’re brand new or torn to pieces!  Earn your Burnout Driver’s license by competing in over 100+ events including Races, Stunt Run, Road Rages and Marked Man.  Compete against your friends for Time Road Rules and tear up the streets in Showtime, the all new destructive open world crashing experience.  Looking for an online challenge, seamlessly connect with up to 7 buddies instantly, drive together cooperatively in over 300 Freeburn challenges or go head to head in custom created race routes across town. Take down your friends and grab their mugshots for your trophy room using the Xbox Live Vision Camera! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

contentRating.label: E10 (Everyone 10+)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Burnout™ Paradise 1.9
childDownloads.description: This update brings the latest game changing enhancements to your copy of Burnout™ Paradise direct from Criterion Games.

childDownloads.title: Burnout™ Paradise Big Surf Island
childDownloads.description: Get this pack and head over the suspension bridge at the end of 4th Street to reach Big Surf Island! A whole new location packed with gameplay. - The Dust Storm Buggy available to drive straight away - 8 New Cars to Win - 15 Events (Including all New Island Tours) - 10 Freeburn Challenges - 12 New Roads to Rule - 75 Island Smashes - 45 Island Billboards - 15 Island Mega Jumps Explore every part of Big Surf Island from the roads to the roof-tops and when you feel like a change of scenery head off-road to Perren’s Point. For this game addition to work you need to ensure your copy of Burnout Paradise is updated to the latest version. (Burnout™ Paradise 1.9) There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Burnout Paradise Big Surf Island Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Big Surf Island is a new destination added to Paradise City for you to explore. The Island contains over 5 hours of gameplay bringing you more of everything you love about Burnout Paradise with a few new surprises along the way.  Drive over the suspension bridge at the end of 4th Street to start your Burnout vacation! Explore every part of Big Surf Island from the roads to the roof-tops and when you feel like a change of scenery head off-road to Perren’s Point.

childDownloads.title: Burnout™ Paradise Boost Specials Collection
childDownloads.description: We know you all love Boost. These 2 brand new vehicles are perfect for all those players wanting more. Featuring both the Hawker Mech and the Carson Extreme Hot Rod, getting this collection will give you a great saving over purchasing these cars individually. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Burnout Paradise Cars Art Theme
childDownloads.description: Theme your 360 dashboard with artwork based on Burnout Paradise’s selection of spectacular cars. Features 4 wallpaper images. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Burnout Paradise Cops & Robbers
childDownloads.description: Fans of the game will be familiar with the PCPD Special and the Hunter Citizen - our two cop cars. We've added Police liveries to another 33 cars and built a brand new team game for up to 8-players online. Your goal is to find and retrieve Gold located throughout Paradise City. Cops must recover the Gold before the Robbers get it back to their base. Simple Online Fun! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Burnout™ Paradise demo
childDownloads.description: Welcome to the Burnout Paradise Demo. Explore Motor City, Big Surf Beach and Ocean View. Discover Jumps, Stunts and Smashes all over the map. For the full Burnout experience, buy the full game coming in January 2008.

childDownloads.title: Burnout™ Paradise Legendary Cars Collection
childDownloads.description: We've taken some of your favourite cars from Burnout Paradise and recreated them with a twist. Featuring: Jansen 88 Special, Hunter Cavalry Bootlegger, Hunter Manhattan Spirit and the Carson GT Nighthawk. The Legendary Car Collection brings you all 4 of the Legendary cars in one great value package. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Burnout Paradise Manufacturer Gamerpics
childDownloads.description: Ten gamer pictures featuring Burnout Paradise car manufacturer logos. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Burnout Paradise Pack Art Theme
childDownloads.description: Theme your 360 dashboard with artwork based on the stunning, new pack front for the latest installment of the hugely popular Burnout franchise. Features 4 wallpaper images. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Burnout™ Paradise Party
childDownloads.description: Share your Burnout™ experiences with your friends as you gather around the TV for this new multi-player game mode. Compete against up to 7 friends as you try to showcase your skills across multiple challenges featuring all of your favourite Burnout cars and locations. For this game addition to work you need to ensure your copy of Burnout Paradise is updated to the latest version. (Burnout™ Paradise 1.6) There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Burnout Paradise The Ultimate Box Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Upgrade to the Ultimate Box today!  Play in new online game modes, race around Paradise City on motorcycles, and take the fun offline with a new pass-the-pad multiplayer mode.  More great content is available through the Burnout Store today!

childDownloads.title: Burnout™ Paradise Time Savers Pack
childDownloads.description: This is the ideal purchase for all those players that want all of the Burnout Paradise cars and bikes but don't quite have the time to win them all. Purchasing this pack will immediately unlock all the cars that you can get for free by playing Burnout Paradise all the way to completion. However, you'll still need to win the events to earn your Burnout Licenses. Now there's no excuse to not getting online and mixing it with all the other members of the Burnout Paradise community. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Burnout™ Paradise Toy Car Collection 1
childDownloads.description: Featuring Hunter's Cavalry and Manhattan, the Jansen P12 and the awesome Krieger WTR this pack represents fantastic value over purchasing these cars individually. Check out Toy Car Collection 2 for more favourites and don't miss the amazing Toy version of the Nakamura Firehawk motorbike. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Burnout™ Paradise Toy Car Collection 2
childDownloads.description: This collection features Hunter's Takedown 4x4 and incredible Citizen partnering up with Carson's GT Concept and the ubiquitous Inferno Van. Purchasing this collection gives you a great discount from buying these cars individually. Be sure to check out Toy Car Collection 1 and don't miss the amazing Toy version of the Nakamura Firehawk motorbike. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Burnout™ Paradise Toy Collection
childDownloads.description: This collection gets you all of the fantastic Burnout Paradise Toys in one pack. Hunter bring you the Cavalry, Manhattan, Citizen and Takedown 4x4. Carson wade in with the GT Concept and Inferno van, Jansen offer up the wonderful P12 and the Krieger WTR rounds off the cars. Last but not least, Nakamura have created a Toy version of the fantastic Firehawk bike. All of the fan favourites in Toy form at incredible value. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Burnout Paradise Trailer
childDownloads.description: Take your dangerous driving experience to a whole new level with Burnout Paradise.  Crashing is awesome!  Next-gen technology delivers unprecedented levels of crash deformation allowing you experience the most explosive pile-ups in the series’ history.  Burnout Paradise delivers the original vision for the Burnout franchise, an open world environment where you can do anything, anywhere, anytime!

childDownloads.title: Carson Annihilator Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: The Carson Annihilator is a four wheel embodiment of the American Dream. The freedom of the open road! The working class kid made good! Any and all deficiencies made up with pure power and noise! It’s affordable big block muscle, home customized into a supercar stomping street machine. It may not be refined; but it’s brash, it’s effective and it’s a heck of a lot of fun. So lose your pretensions, cut a big hole in your hood for any bits of engine that won’t fit underneath it, and just let yourself go!

childDownloads.title: Carson Extreme Hot Rod
childDownloads.description: Carson's Extreme Hot Rod - With a one shot Boost system that will have you firing and never-forgetting! Fill the Boost then fire it off and hang on for the ride of your life because once it's on, it's on for good. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Carson GT Concept Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: The new generation of American muscle cars is here. The Carson GT Concept. After decades in the motoring wilderness, American car manufacturers finally rediscovered the key ingredient of a successful muscle car. It’s muscle! Groundbreaking! What’s more, having been made after 1975 it might even make it round the occasional corner.

childDownloads.title: Carson GT Nighthawk
childDownloads.description: Developed in secret, the GT Nighthawk shouldn't exist. Denied by the Government, disowned by Carson, the GT Nighthawk is the ultimate super pursuit vehicle. Featuring a fully digital interior and state of the art aerodynamics. Firing the boost on this car pops the rear spoiler and lets everyone know you're coming. Jump in for a glimpse of the future. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Carson Nighthawk GT Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Outfitted with a massive power plant this car is second to none with the best acceleration in Paradise City! Available now through the in-game Burnout Store!

childDownloads.title: Cops and Robbers Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Cops and Robbers is the ultimate team competition for Burnout Paradise. Fans of the game will be familiar with the PCPD Special and the Hunter Citizen - our two cop cars. We've added Police liveries to another 33 cars and built a brand new team game for up to 8-players online. Your goal is to find and retrieve Gold located throughout Paradise City. Cops must recover the Gold before the Robbers get it back to their base.

childDownloads.title: Demo Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: From Motor City to Big Surf Beach pull off wicked stunts in the all-new Stunt mode and race through the streets in search of the fastest Burnout Route in the Hunter Cavalry car.  Invite up to three friends into your game and connect with them instantly to complete three online challenges or simply smash each other up and grab your their Burnout Mugshot.  Download the demo starting December 13, 2007.

childDownloads.title: Guns N Roses Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Take me down to Paradise City!  Guns N’ Roses tears up the road with the ultimate rock anthem that symbolizes the ultimate in rebellious behavior and gets your adrenaline pumping.  Burnout Paradise offers a truly volatile mix of rock's most dangerous tracks -- beginning with the iconic 'Paradise City' -- for an audio fuel as explosive as the game itself.  Seeing how Burnout is one of the world's most popular racing franchises, it demands a soundtrack that matches the game's intensity at every level

childDownloads.title: Hawker Mech
childDownloads.description: The team at Hawker have come up with something very special here. The wonderful Solo has had its Boost system specially modified with a unique ability. Now, at will, the driver can switch between Stunt, Speed and Aggression Boost systems. This car could truly be the ultimate all-rounder. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
